modName: Better Dawnguard DLC Weapons and Armor
summary: Improves the damage and speed of weapons added in the Dawnguard dlc.
descriptionHtml:
Better Dawnguard DLC Weapons High Level/Overpowered 
This mod aims to improve the base attributes of the weapons added through the Dawnguard dlc. It includes changes to all dragonbone weapons and arrows, all crossbows and bolts, Auriel\'s Bow, Sunhallowed and Bloodcursed Elven Arrows, Harkon\'s sword, and all Dawnguard faction weapons. Harkon\'s Sword now has a much higher charge so you won\'t have to recharge it as often, and I also raised the damage done by the enchantment from 15 to 75. All armors added by the dlc now have higher armor ratings. Now also increase crossbow bolts speed and impact.     
(Recommended for players above level 35 or who want over powered weapons)


Better Dawnguard DLC Weapons and Armor Low Level/Realistic Damage
This mod aims to raise the damage, and armor rating of all weapons and armor add through the DLC by a realistic and reasonable amount. This only changes the base attributes by 4-5 points and makes the Dragonbone weapons slightly better than their Daedric counterparts.
I also thought that Auriel\'s Bow being the legendary bow foretold about in the Elder Scrolls should be more powerful than the Dragonbone Bow so it now does 3 points more damage than than its Dragonbone counterpart. Harkon\'s Sword now has a much higher charge so you won\'t have to recharge it as often, but I did not change the damage done by the enchantment. Now also increases crossbow bolt speeds.  

(Recommended for people who want more realistic changes to weapon attributes or lower level players.) 


Faster Dragonbone Arrows
This mod contains 4 speed options for the Dragonbone Arrows: 25% faster, 50% faster, 75% faster, and 100% faster. Just choose which one you want and extract it to your Skyrim/Data folder and make sure to load after main file.

Let me know if you think anything is overpowered or needs to be changed.

Changes:

Dragonbone Battleaxe
Damage: 50
Speed: 0.8000
Reach: 1.3000

Dragonbone Bow
Damage: 44
Speed: 0.9000
Reach: 1.000

Dragonbone Dagger
Damage: 36
Speed: 1.4000
Reach: 0.7000

Dragonbone Greatsword
Damage: 49
Speed: 0.9000
Reach: 1.3000

Dragonbone Mace
Damage: 41
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Dragonbone Sword
Damage: 39
Speed: 1.2000
Reach: 1.0000

Dragonbone War Axe
Damage: 40
Speed: 1.1000
Reach: 1.0000

Dragonbone Warhammer
Damage: 52
Speed: 0.7000
Reach: 1.3000

Dragonbone Arrows
Damage: 49
Speed: 3600.0000 (without optional Faster Dragonbone Arrows mod)

Auriel\'s Bow
Damage: 80
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Crossbow
Damage: 30
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Enhanced Crossbow
Damage: 50
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Dwarven Crossbow
Damage: 40
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Enhanced Dwarven Crossbow
Damage: 60
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Dawnguard War Axe
Damage: 26
Speed: 0.9000
Reach: 1.0000

Dawnguard Rune Axe
Damage: 31
Speed: 0.9000
Reach: 1.0000

Dawnguard Warhammer
Damage: 37
Speed: 0.6000
Reach: 1.3000

Dawnguard Rune Hammer
Damage: 47
Speed: 0.6000
Reach: 1.3000

Harkon\'s Sword
Damage: 38
Speed: 1.0000
Reach: 1.0000

Sunhallowed Elven Arrows
Damage: 26

Bloodcursed Elven Arrows
Damage: 26

Steel Bolts
Damage: 16

Dwarven Bolts
Damage: 24


Load order

improveddawnguardweapons.esp
fasterdragonbonearrows.esp


Future Updates

Upload new file with lower damages for lower level players
Make Harkon\'s sword either have a higher or unlimited charge
Make armors from the dlc have better armor ratings and maybe make the heavy armors lighter


Change Log

v1.3
Added the more realistic damage improvement file to the Better Dawnguard DLC Weapons and Armor mod
Slightly raised the armor ratings of all the armors added by the dlc

v1.2
Changed the damage inflicted by Harkon\'s Sword enchantment from 15 to 75

v1.1 (Faster Dragonbone Arrows)
Fixed speed issue with 75% and 100% speed increase

v1.1
Reduced Dragonbone Arrow speed back to vanilla speed
Added Faster Dragonbone Arrow file


Installation
Use NMM or copy the .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

Uninstall
Use NMM or delete the .esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.


Credits
Thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim!
author: abunchofalpacas
